org.mixare
Class PaintableObject

java.lang.Object
  org.mixare.PaintableObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
PaintableBox, PaintableBoxedText, PaintableCircle, PaintableGps, PaintableIcon, PaintableLine, PaintablePoint, PaintablePosition, PaintableRadarPoints, PaintableText
public abstract class PaintableObject
extends java.lang.Object

This abstract class provides many methods paint objects on a given Canvas.

Author:
Justin Wetherell
